greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of signed triangle A062137 (generalized Laguerre, a=3).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
program: (PARI) { f=1; for (n=0, 100, if (n>1, f*=n); a=f*binomial(n+3, n); g=1; a+=sum(m=1, n, ((-1)^m)*f*binomial(n+3, n-m)/g*=m); write("b062146.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009
(MAGMA) m:=25; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:=Coefficients(R!(Exp(-x/(1-x))/(1-x)^4)); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 11 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
